overview: I am interested in producing quality, maintainable software.

experience.title: Product Builder
experience.description: I optimize repetitive manual access patterns of atomic subproblems to create efficiency for humans in technical roles.
accomplishments: Built a publicly available and service to optimize repetitive access patterns of atomic subproblems to create efficiency for humans in technical roles.

experience.title: VP of Engineering (Most Recent)
experience.description: When I started working at RTRS, I was the sole developer, a contractor, and my hours were capped at seven per week due to funding.  Years later, I led a team of engineers building a product used by Fortune 500 companies. My leadership spanned mobile, web, and backend.
accomplishments: Adanced from a contractor role to leading a team of engineers building a risk mitigation product being used by Fortune 500 companies.  Leadership spanned FE/BE, mobile, web and cloud.
Wrote over 1000 integration/unit tests for Django/DRF and performed major release framework/dependency upgrades.
Automated deployments and code quality checks using Github Actions.

experience.title: IoT Engineer (Contract)
experience.description: This was a cutting edge hardware technology project that I served on as the lead developer for the first two iterations.
accomplishments: Wrote a web-based cluster manager and sensor polling subsystem for parallelized data aggregation across layer 3 boundaries.
Completed extensive TX/RX serial and I2C (AMD SAMD21 Arduino) against
Wrote custom hardware drivers for a CDM7160 CO2 module and Nimbleink 4G LTE celluar modem. Built a web-based wpa_supplicant wrapper and backend route manager for layer 3 flow between data uplinks.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer (Contract)
experience.description: Automated the build and release of iOS, Android, and Rails applications, then retained to complete additional work.
accomplishments: Completed two major version upgrades of a monolithic Rails code base including AMS.
Automated the build and release of iOS, Android, and Rails applications using Jenkins.

experience.title: Senior Systems Administrator
accomplishments: Greenfielded a multimillion dollar research computing environment. Executed core buildout and consolidated disparate source environments.

Led the design and implementation of an HPC-integrated bioinformatics data analysis and tool pipeline platform (Galaxy, Torque). Automated filesystem hierarchy and POSIX ACL consistency with web data libraries.

Developed a billing ERP system in Ruby on Rails. Coded numerous features including metered cloud billing, client invoicing, mainframe transaction processing, roll-up multidimensional reporting, subsidization tracking, automatic asset lifecycle initiation, and role-based security.
Wrote a Python provisioning tool for synchronizing IAM objects between Internet2 Grouper, Centrify DirectControl, and Isilon OneFS. Achieved global UID/GID to SID coherency.

experience.title: Security Engineer
accomplishments: Identified point in time ownership of IP addresses by designing a common information model, metadata abstraction schema, and time series correlation logic for billions of unstructured events (Splunk). Performed index tuning and optimization.
Authored a multi-user GnuPG wrapper for facilitating granular access control to privileged passwords.
Performed Expect.pm automation against an IP network comprised of 2000+ programmable assets.
Implemented cross-platform PKI authenticated IPsec. Achieved proficiency in IKE debugging.
Deployed a vendor-neutral network ACL management and provisioning platform.

education.credential: Bachelor of Business Administration (Management Information Systems)
